skip st - stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet yo - yarn over front-loop only foundation single_crochet - chain 2 insert hook into first chain yo draw up loop yo draw through one loop yo draw through both loops on hook one front-loop only single_crochet worked *insert hook into bottom of previous stitch through front loop only yo draw up loop yo draw through one loop yo draw through both loops on hook second front-loop only foundation single_crochet worked repeat from * to work the number of stitches required bead stitch bs - *yo insert hook under previous double_crochet from right to left yo draw up loop repeat from * 2 more times yo draw through 6 loops on hook yo draw through remaining two loops on hook see close-up photo of bs following pattern modified bead stitch mod bs - *yo insert hook under double_crochet or chain 2 space of previous row yo draw up loop repeat from * 2 more times yo draw through 6 loops on hook yo draw through remaining two loops on hook © 2008 andrea moberly sizing information sizes are shown with size 5 first followed by the following sizes in parentheses 5 6 7 8 10 12 custom these sizes were determined using the children s measurement and garment sizes found here http //www fibergypsy com/common/children shtml ** custom sizing information ** to custom-size this shrug use the following instructions to determine your pattern numbers in bold are custom numbers listed in pattern measure from the top middle of the shoulder to the center of the underarm of wearer in inches and add 1 inch for ease or measure armhole depth of garment shrug is to be worn with do not add 1 inch to this measurement this is your number x measure across the widest part of the back of the wearer or garment shrug is to be worn with in inches this is your number y measure arm from bottom of wrist to underarm in inches this is your number z to determine beginning chain length 2 93*y = b round b to the nearest even number this is your number c to determine number of row repeats for body 1 75*x -2 = e round this number up to the nearest number this is your number f to determine number of round repeats for sleeves z-4 = g round this number to the nearest number this is your number h for stitch counts you will also use numbers s and t s= c - 2 /2 t= f+1 *2 +4 © 2008 andrea moberly body
